basics.name: Shayan Dadman
basics.label: PhD Candidate
basics.summary: A multi-lingual PhD Candidate exploring the intersection of multi-agent systems and reinforcement learning in the context of symbolic music generation.

education.area: Multi-agent systems and reinforcement learning in symbolic music generation

work.name: UiT The Arctic University of Norway, Narvik
work.summary: Contributed to AI projects and facilitated workshops on machine learning and deep learning techniques. Organized educational events and guided master's students in their dissertations.
Collaborated with various clients on web development projects focusing on user-friendly websites and SEO integration.
Maintained the company's local network and developed tailored network solutions.
Worked on enhancing network performance and security by developing solutions aligned with the company's needs.
Supported different web development projects and learned from experienced professionals.

work.summary: Collaborated in enhancing the company's digital presence through various design projects and improved operational efficiencies.
